testcase.name: Verify title on launching the app
Todos list should be empty
Footer should not be displayed
Clear completed button should not be displayed
Todo should not be created if an empty text string was entered
Todo should be successfully added to list
Todo text should be trimmed before creation
New Todo input should be cleared after adding a Todo
Footer should be displayed after adding a to do
Upon adding Todo remaining count should equal number of todos created
Double click on a Todo should show editable text, it should save the change successfully
Hitting escape while editing should not save changes
Adding empty text while editing should remove the Todo
Adding empty spaces while editing should be trimmed while saving the ToDo
should allow me to mark all items as completed
should allow me to clear the completion state of all items
All todos should be incomplete after creation
Clicking on checkbox of first Todo should mark it as complete
Click and unclick of checkbox for a Todo should leave the Todo as incomplete
Clicking on active list should change URL and update list items to 2
Clicking on completed link should change URL and update list items to 1
Clear completed button should be visible as we have a completed todo
Clear completed button should be hidden once clicked, number of items in the list should be updated
delete todo button should display on mouse hover

testsuite.name: todomvc.Verify data persistence on page refresh

testcase.classname: todomvc.Verify data persistence on page refresh
testcase.name: Page refresh should still show the same data as last
